section.title: Weekly Giellatekno + Divvun meetings
section.p: Giellatekno and Divvun had regular weekly meetings in the period 2005 through 2011. They were held at 10 AM Norwegian time each Monday morning, unless otherwise agreed upon. The memos for the meetings are listed below.
It is possible to extract the tasks as iCal todo items.

section.title: Meetings In Real Life (IRL)
section.p: We have had and are having physical meetings, that is, meetings IRL. So far, the following meetings have been held (links are to notes or programme for the meetings):

ul.li: Tromsø, Aug. 2006: Board meeting, and combined seminar for the two projects (Divvun and Disamb)
Tromsø, Jan. 2006: Combined seminar for the two projects (Divvun and Disamb)
Guovdageaidnu, Oct. 2005: Board meeting combined with a work meeting
Helsinki, Aug. 2005: Meeting in front of FSMNLP05 in Helsinki
